name: Inah Omoronyia
content: Inah Omoronyia - University of Bristol View Scopus Profile Dr Inah Omoronyia BEng, MSc Senior Lecturer in Privacy, School of Computer Science https://orcid.org/0000-0001-5357-0945 Emailinah.omoronyiabristol.acuk BS8 1UB Personal profile Research interests My research focuses on the intersections of software, privacy engineering and security as well as regulatory compliance. I investigates and builds frameworks, tools and techniques for engineering secured and privacy preserving software systems. I am an ERCIM Fellow. https://inah-dev.github.io/profile/ Fingerprint Dive into the research topics where Inah Omoronyia is active. These topic labels come from the works of this person.
